page.title: 07Small Businesses-General
page.content: Although it may not seem at first that in such an agricultural area there could be much opportunity for business, nonetheless there are a number of small businesses in the part of Church Fenton in this block. Whilstthese could not all be described as thriving, in that there is no expansion planned, most of them make a reasonable living. Those that do better, attract business from a wide area eg. Leeds, Selby and north. Such business usually coming by word of mouth rather than advertising. Other firms exist to serve the local community by offering personal service which could not be obtained from larger concerns. These probably could not survive if their owners were dependent upon this alone for their livelihoods.
